constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 203 (Tuesday, November 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEGUSE:
H.R. 6077.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H6674]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To authorize the National Cyber Director to accept details from other elements of the Federal Government on nonreimbursable basis, and for other purposes.
